value:
The flowers are in full bloom...like
a beautiful dream. And such a lovely
fragrance too.

I hope Prince Lewyn is doing all right.
Erinys was to retrieve him, but there
is still much she has to learn...

Ah. One moment, please...$k$pThere we are. I wanted to finish
mending this tunic first. Now,
you have my full attention.

Hm? Prince Lewyn? Ah... No, pay
me no mind.

I may have a certain inflexibility, but
as a knight, one must be stalwart to
carry out their duties properly.

I am one of the Four Heavenly
Knights of Silesse, Annand. I bring
a gift from $Nf.

No matter the time or place, as
a knight of Silesse, I must fight
in a fashion worthy of that title.
Do not fret. Leave the skies to me.

Even as one of the Four Heavenly
Knights, I must not allow this to
lower my spirits.

With my blade and this new power,
I will be an extension of your will.
Permit me to show you.

I am Annand, a knight of Silesse.
On the honor of the Four Heavenly
Knights, I vow to defend you.

Do you know much of my homeland,
Silesse, $Nu?$k$pIt is surrounded by treacherous
mountains, a land of snow and ice.$k$pThere is hardly any land suitable for
growing crops, so our country faces
a harsh reality.$k$pBut even under those conditions, we
have our queen, Lahna, who reminds
us there is more than the cold dark.$k$pShe is a kind and gentle soul, ever
concerned with her people... I would
give everything to protect her.$k$pYour fight here is also for the sake
of the people. I sense no lust for
war or conquest with the Order.$k$pSo, I will happily join you, and we
can bring this fight to its rightful
conclusion together.
はっ
Sorry
くうっ
Not yet...!
As Fate wills...
I must act.
Foolish...
As a knight of Silesse!
Erinys... Lewyn...
Hehe
I am a knight of Silesse, and my name is Annand.
Oh, Lord Lewyn—? Ah, you are not Lord Lewyn. Apologies.
I am one of the Four Heavenly Knights of Silesse. I will fight honorably.
My lady, Lahna, is the picture of virtue and compassion. It is an honor to serve her.
I cannot be other than I am.
Lord Lewyn...I wish you well.
Together, you and I will fight without restraint or regret.
Leave it to me.
A hard choice.
Let us fly.
